scripts.nuke: docker stop pg-comp-model && docker rm pg-comp-model && docker volume rm pgdata
scripts.launchDocker: docker run --name pg-comp-model -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=docker -d -p 5432:5432 -v pgdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data postgres:latest
scripts.build: npm -s run clean && npm -s run generate && tsc
scripts.generate: npm -s run generate:prisma && npm -s run generate:nexus
scripts.seed: npm run uvu-seed && npm run fcc-seed
